title: How can Taylor Swift write so many great songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Taylor Swift songs definitely comes from experiences she has which is a great way to relate to others. Add that she knows how to translate her emotions into a song and her lyrics really appeal to people who are struggling with the same issues. Her strength in song writing is, for the most part, relating to people who are in similar situations. Every good songwriter does have a team. That doesn't discount anything that Taylor Swift puts into a song, but it is important to suggest that a song crafted for a perfect sound is far better than someone who belts out a few words. Even though she is young, her team is solid and fans should expect that she will continue to create hit after hit.

With drama and verve. I wrote them as lyrical answers to Prince’s proddings and leading questions. They were my creative lyrical lesson primer, and yes he was obviously very furious when I threw a lyrical feast upon learning of my own impending death in ‘96. I figured I was dead anyway… ‘Look What You Made Me Do’ is actually a spectrum analysis of my personality it makes me trackable online, and it also brought my old self from 1987 back from the dead as if per a True Ressurection spell. It’s what I wished for as a child, because my child personality wanted to live in an adult body in middle age because it would be ‘different’, and another adventure. Definitely is very different! My friends don’t recognize me any more and my ex thinks I’ve gone full delusional, and he doesn’t trust or believe me at all. He says my personality has totally transformed in under a year, and he hates the independent thinking and acting woman I have become. I like my child-personality, it is significantly stronger, and I have no plans on returning to the weak, needy, and broken thing I was just a few years ago.

She doesn't write them Max Martin does. People have to realise there is always a team behind these pop artists writing everything. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Max_Martin 
Here is max martins wiki as you can see he has written for Katy perry, Taylor Swift, maroon 5 and so on. ''Co wrote'' in the pop world means had wrote a few lyrics here and there but the main input is always from people behind the scenes. trust me.

She was lucky enough to be born with a natural talent for it, and has also put in lots of effort and practice. She probably writes some real stinkers too, but chooses to trash them early on. Remember, we only see her best work.

in her 1989 deluxe album, she includes three voice memos that illustrate her songwriting process for blank space, I wish you would, and I know places. writing to track, writing to concepts, and just jamming and experimenting with some professionals who can give you opinions or really good ideas
